name: Laser Blast (itch)
description:
When entering the game.
Play: Enter Key

Player control 1.
Left: Key A.
Right: Key D.
Up: Key W.
Down: Key S.
Shoot: Space Key.

Player control 2.
Left: Left Arrow Key.
Right: Right Arrow Key.
Up: Up Arrow Key.
Work: Down Arrow Key.
Shoot: Enter Key.

----------------------------------

New Version 1.1.0.0
* Bug Fix.
* New Enemy.
* More Difficult.
